ValidationRule.description: If Expenses coverage % is specified, duration and unit of time should be specified too.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT ISNULL( Expenses_Covered__c ), OR( ISNULL( Duration_of_Expenses__c ), ISPICKVAL( Unit_of_Time_Expenses__c , "")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify the duration and unit of time of Expenses coverage.
